channel.title: List of Secure Computation Papers
channel.description: A list of papers on IACR eprint on the topic of secure computation.

item.title: Efficient Constant-Round MPC with Identifiable Abort and Public Verifiability
item.description: Carsten Baum and Emmanuela Orsini and Peter Scholl and Eduardo Soria-Vazquez

item.title: CRAFT: Composable Randomness and Almost Fairness from Time
item.description: Carsten Baum and Bernardo David and Rafael Dowsley and Jesper Buus Nielsen and Sabine Oechsner

item.title: Trace-$\Sigma$: a privacy-preserving contact tracing app
item.description: Jean-François Biasse and Sriram Chelleppan and Sherzod Kariev and Noyem Khan and Lynette Menezes and Efe Seyitoglu and Charurut Somboonwit and Attila Yavuz

item.title: PHyCT : Privacy preserving Hybrid Contact Tracing
item.description: Mahabir Prasad Jhanwar and Sumanta Sarkar

item.title: Toward Comparable Homomorphic Encryption for Crowd-sensing Network
item.description: Daxin Huang and Qingqing Gan and Xiaoming Wang and Chengpeng Huang and Yijian Lin

item.title: Secure merge with $O(n \log \log n)$ secure operation
item.description: Brett Hemenway Falk and Rafail Ostrovsky

item.title: Private Set Intersection from TFHE for Cloud Computing Scenarios
item.description: Jiayu Qiang and Yi Deng

item.title: Minimax Approximation of Sign Function by Composite Polynomial for Homomorphic Comparison
item.description: Eunsang Lee and Joon-Woo Lee and Jong-Seon No and Young-Sik Kim

item.title: FROST: Flexible Round-Optimized Schnorr Threshold Signatures
item.description: Chelsea Komlo and Ian Goldberg

item.title: Linear-Complexity Private Function Evaluation is Practical
item.description: Marco Holz and Ágnes Kiss and Deevashwer Rathee and Thomas Schneider

item.title: Where are you Bob? Privacy-Preserving Proximity Testing with a Napping Party

item.title: Faster Homomorphic Encryption over GPGPUs via hierarchical DGT

item.title: Linear Complexity Private Set Intersection for Secure Two-Party Protocols
